ComicInfo.Title: The Duel; Rock 'n' Roll Adventure
ComicInfo.Summary:
In this issue, the legendary rabbit ronin Miyamoto Usagi enters a town square, and a dueling contest with a malevolent bet keeper and his assistant, who, too, is a ronin himself. When Usagi is placed up against the other samurai in a gamble with death, who will win?
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-30 10:15:13. [CVDB33757]
